meanings.definition: Unable to be separated or disassociated.
meanings.sent1: The twins were indissociable, always together and never apart.
meanings.sent2: The bond between the two friends was indissociable, they were always by each other's side.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces were indissociable, refusing to fit together no matter how hard we tried.
meanings.sent4: Their destinies were indissociable, intertwined in a complex web of fate.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the rainbow were indissociable, blending seamlessly into a beautiful arc in the sky.

meanings.sent1: The inseparable duo were indissociable, always seen together wherever they went.
meanings.sent2: The love between the couple was indissociable, evident in every glance and touch.
meanings.sent3: The peanut butter and jelly were indissociable, a classic combination loved by all.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was indissociable, like two peas in a pod.
meanings.sent5: The melody and lyrics of the song were indissociable, creating a harmonious blend of music.
